product.title: Oculus Modern Grey Magic Screen Roller Blind
product.description: The oculus modern grey magic screen roller blind is mid-grey in tone and will harmonise with many colour schemes. Although we love the colour the real story here is the magic screen fabric. The unique fabric design ensures daytime privacy but allows a view to the outside too.

relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.
